Desc.entry: Council run centre for the use of the local community providing sports and physical activities. Available for private hire for sports/physical activity sessions, training courses and community events/meetings. Groups using the centre include Agewell, Connexions and Taekwondo. Also available for hire for parties 9am-9pm (please contact for availability). Facilities include sports hall, training/meeting room, male and female changing rooms/toilets, kitchen, outdoor play area and free car parking.
